name: Misery Street
description:
Welcome to Misery Street! An adventure RPG about humanity, loneliness and existential dread. Explore a dark world full of mystery, KILL vicious monsters, solve puzzles, become a HERO or just try to get to the end where the meaning of life is supposed to be...

GAMEPLAY FEATURES:

  • Play time of about 10 - 20 hours, with a unique NewGame+.
  • Hundreds of odd items, weapons and armor.
  • Funny albeit dark dialogues with weird and hopeless freaks.
  • Balanced fights.
  • Synergies with various combinations of equipment, skills and items that allow for many play-styles.
  • A friend to talk to anytime on your journey.
  • More than 250 distinct monsters for you to MURDER.
  • At least one cat.
  • Secrets. Lots of secrets.
